接口 MediaManagerInterface<T extends MediaManager>

  • 所有已知子接口:
    MonitorManagerInterface, RecordManagerInterface
    所有已知实现类:
    CloudRecordManager, DevRecordManager, LocalRecordManager, MediaManager, MonitorManager, RecordManager
